\section*{FSK signal}

\begin{verbatim}
clear

besked='123 dette er en test: abc';

fstart = 500;
fstop = 16000;
fs=10*fstop

Baudrate=2;

Tsymbol=1/Baudrate

x = FSKgenerator(besked, fstart, fstop, Tsymbol, fs);

soundsc(x, fs)

subplot(211), plot(x)
subplot(212), plot(abs(fft(x)))

figure
spectrogram(x, hamming(fs*Tsymbol), 0, fs*Tsymbol, fs);
\end{verbatim}

        \color{lightgray} \begin{verbatim}
fs =

      160000


Tsymbol =

    0.5000

\end{verbatim} \color{black}
